about.title: Why Choose Us
about.text:
By choosing “Healthy Food,” you’re choosing quality, freshness, and care for your health. We are a team of like-minded people who believe that proper nutrition is the foundation of a long and happy life. Our selection includes only natural products without harmful additives, grown with love and care. We work closely with trusted suppliers to ensure your safety and the best taste.

We understand how important it is to have a convenient and user-friendly service, so we constantly improve our website and support service. Our goal is to make healthy eating accessible to everyone, regardless of age or lifestyle. We support you on your journey to health by offering helpful tips and recipes to make your diet balanced and varied.

By trusting us, you’re getting more than just products — you’re receiving real care, professionalism, and a love for natural food. Choose “Healthy Food” — choose health and quality every day.

one.title: Menu №1 — “Japanese Balance”
one.desc:
A light and balanced lunch that keeps you energized without heaviness.
The optimal choice for productive work or study.
Nutrition: Calories: ~550 kcal; Protein: 25 g; Fat: 18 g; Carbs: 60 g.

two.title: Menu №2 — “Vegetable Pasta with Chicken”
list: Wheat pasta with a mix of carrots, broccoli, peas, corn, tomatoes, and some olives
Aromatic spices and a light olive oil sauce
Juicy chicken pieces arranged on the sides
two.desc:
A tasty dish with rich vegetable flavor, helping you recharge after a busy day.
Great option for a light dinner or hearty lunch.
Nutrition: Calories: ~610 kcal; Protein: 30 g; Fat: 17 g; Carbs: 66 g.

three.title: Menu №3 — “Asian Harmony”
three.desc:
A hearty meal with vibrant Asian flavors that supports optimal nutrition.
Perfect for a work break or cozy dinner.
Nutrition: Calories: ~620 kcal; Protein: 28 g; Fat: 20 g; Carbs: 70 g.

four.title: Menu №4 — “Mediterranean Touch”
list: Fried fish with a wedge of lime
Mini salad: bell pepper, cucumber, cherry tomatoes
four.desc:
Rich in omega-3 and vitamins, this meal supports cardiovascular health and strengthens immunity.
A great choice for staying energized and feeling good.
Nutrition: Calories: ~640 kcal; Protein: 32 g; Fat: 22 g; Carbs: 65 g.
